contact.contactName: Toronto and East York Community Council

noticeDescription: Take notice that the Council of the City of Toronto has passed By-law No. 1020-2017 to designate 140 Merton Street (the War Amputations of Canada – War Amps Building) (St. Paul’s, Ward 22) as being of cultural heritage value or interest.

otherReferenceList.description: TE22.20 - Intention to Designate under Part IV, Section 29 of the Ontario Heritage Act and Authority to Enter into a Heritage Easement Agreement - 140 Merton Street
By-law 1020-2017 - To designate the property at 140 Merton Street (the War Amputations of Canada-War Amps Building) as being of cultural heritage value or interest

subheading: In the Matter of the Ontario Heritage Act R.S.O. 1990 Chapter 0.18 and 140 Merton Street (The War Amputations of Canada – War Amps Building)
title: Notice of Passing of By-law 1020-2017 - 140 Merton Street (the War Amputations of Canada – War Amps Building)
topics: Heritage > Designation of a heritage property
